title: Hwang Chi Yeol is on the run for 'Singles' | allkpop.com
text:
Or Login / Register With Us Forgot Password? Remember Me Hwang Chi Yeol is on the run for 'Singles' By KpopJoA 9 minutes ago 798 75 0 1 Google+ Hwang Chi Yeol is on the run for 'Singles' latest spring issue. 
On February 20, fashion magazine 'Singles' presented a series of images featuring the singer wearing a trench coat and leather jumper posing charismatically underneath the night sky. In his interview, Hwang Chi Yeol commented on not receiving the spotlight for nine years, "The 9 years of being a nobody wasn't a time I just want to erase." He continued, "In fact, it's a precious experience that shaped who I am today. I think my mentality got stronger because of it. Even when I had no money in my pocket, I thought to myself, 'I can do it,' 'I'll succeed,' and I didn't give up." 
Hwang Chi Yeol will be collaborating with Red Velvet member Seulgi for his next project 'Fall In Girl Vol. 3' set to release on February 21. YOU MAY LIKE GET AKP IN YOUR INBOX! ..or follow allkpop to stay updated: Tags:
